name: tabtalk-ai
description: TabTalk AI - Chat with any webpage using Google Gemini

scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run build:web
scripts.build:extension: esbuild src/extension/popup.js --bundle --outfile=dist/extension/popup.js --minify && cp -r icons dist/extension/ && cp manifest.json dist/extension/ && cp src/extension/content.js dist/extension/ && cp src/extension/background.js dist/extension/
scripts.build:web: esbuild src/web-app/app.js --bundle --outfile=dist/web/app.js --minify && cp index.html dist/web/ && cp styles.css dist/web/ && cp sw.js dist/web/ && cp manifest.webmanifest dist/web/
scripts.dev: npm run dev:extension & npm run dev:web

author: TabTalk AI Team
